title: "FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific Acquires Exclusive License for Artificial Intelligence for IVF"
excerpt: "FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific, Inc., a world leader in the innovation, development, and manufacture of cell culture media and assisted reproductive technologies (ART), today announced it has exclusively licensed the intellectual property relating to artificial intelligence (AI) for image-based evaluation of human embryos to improve in-vitro fertilization (IVF) success rates."
